bhumikampawak yanu pruthiwiya mathupita athi chalanayak nathahothpruthiwi prushtaye pashana stharawala selawimak magin bhumikampawak athi weyi.pathiwiabhyantharaya sakaswi aththe sthara kipayakini.pruthiwiya mathupita kalapaya pathiwi kabola hewath shila golaya lesa handunwayi.mema kalapaya ekineka ya kala haki pashana thati hewath bhu thati walin nirmanaya wi atha.mema kalapayata yatin pihita aththe prawaranaya namathi kalapayayi.mema prawarana kalapaya mathupita athi wishala lawana sagarayak nirmanaya wi atha.mema kalapaya matha eeta ihalin athi pruthiwi kabole pashana thati pawemin pawathi.samanyayen warshayakata sentimitar kipayak mema pashana thati wiwidhakara dishawalata pawemin pawathi.melesa pawemin pawathina pashana thati dekak ekineka gatimedi athiwana shakthiya bhumikampawak lesa handunwayi.samanyayen pashana thati mayimwaladi nithara gatim athiwana heyin thati mayim aashrithawa prabala bhumikampa siduweyi.
